headline: What Makes Atmos Energy Corporation (ATO) a Solid Pick for a Buy and Hold Portfolio
summary: Atmos Energy Corporation (NYSE:ATO) is included among the 10 Best Dividend Stocks to Buy and Hold Forever. The Texas-based natural gas distribution company focuses on providing safe and reliable natural gas services and invests heavily in infrastructure upgrades and safety programs.
